text: Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez just took their love affair to international waters. ( Photo : Dia Dipasupil, ( Credit too long, see caption ) ) They'll always have Paris. Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez escaped to the City of Lights for a romantic weekend, documenting their vacation — or, as Lopez called it, their ` ` baecation'' — in a series of envious Instagram snaps. Before they landed in the French capital, the couple spent several days in Monte Carlo and St. Tropez, allowing Rodriguez to channel his inner James Bond at the casino. # casinoroyalestyle A post shared by Alex Rodriguez ( @ arod ) on Jun 14, 2017 at 2 : 03pm PDT Then, it was off to Paris for J - Lo and A - Rod,
